entry.title: jhavagned/track-metadata-api: Track Metadata API is a lightweight Express-based API that connects to MongoDB to retrieve metadata for songs. Currently, it features a single endpoint to access music-related data, with the potential for future expansion.

entry.title: GWMDhananjaya/React-color-picker: A React color picker using React hooks (useState, useRef) that lets users select a color and view its HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV values. Styled with Tailwind CSS, it is lightweight, efficient, and easy to integrate into any React project.
entry.content: A React color picker using React hooks (useState, useRef) that lets users select a color and view its HEX, RGB, HSL, and HSV values. Styled with Tailwind CSS, it is lightweight, efficient, and easy to integrate into any React project.

entry.title: girmasamuel/To-Do-API: The Todo App API is a RESTful API designed for managing tasks and to-dos efficiently. Built with Express, a fast and minimalist web framework for Node.js, this API provides a lightweight and robust solution for task management applications.
entry.content: The Todo App API is a RESTful API designed for managing tasks and to-dos efficiently. Built with Express, a fast and minimalist web framework for Node.js, this API provides a lightweight and robust solution for task management applications.

entry.title: babagha/jpd-express-error: jpd-express-error is a lightweight utility package designed to standardize error handling in Express microservices. It ensures consistent error responses, typed messages, and structured error propagation across your services.
entry.content: jpd-express-error is a lightweight utility package designed to standardize error handling in Express microservices. It ensures consistent error responses, typed messages, and structured error propagation across your services.
